thread.title: Drishyam box office collections: Ajay Devgn starrer rakes in Rs 8.5 crore on day 1
thread.title_full: Drishyam box office collections: Ajay Devgn starrer rakes in Rs 8.5 crore on day 1 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Drishyam box office collections: Ajay Devgn starrer rakes in Rs 8.5 crore on day 1
text:
Other Articles After Aishwarya Rai's 'Jazbaa' film, Sanjay Gupta to announce two new projects Naomi Campbell gets six-month suspended prison sentence Evan Ross, Ashlee Simpson welcome daughter Ajay Devgn starrer Drishyam box office collections have done well enough on day 1 (Friday) to collect Rs 8.5 crore, but not as well as some expected – considering that almost every movie with a big star ( Salman Khan ’s Bajrangi Bhaijaan), or a big theme (Baahubali), releasing nowadays is turning into a money-spinner.
Some have blamed the fact that Drishyam is a very lengthy movie and that this is not appreciated by the audiences any longer. But the fact is that Drishyam is a thriller and keeps the audience rivetted to their seats as the adventures slowly unwind. Another reason being bandied about is that the hero, Ajay Devgn in this instance, who has a wife and kids, is not as captivating of the imagination as a single, macho man.
Take the poll, tell us what you think about Drishyam:
Take Our Poll Be that as it may, Drishyam box office collections are expected to swell further when you add the foreign take to the total – these figures are still to be released.
With the weekend on us, Drishyam is expected to do much better as it has received great reviews and the word-of-mouth is expected to be as positive.
Take another poll:
Take Our Poll First Published on August 01, 2015 7:30 pm
